Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! New residents have
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought them here to introduce them
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Good morning, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL><NAME_UNKOWN>My name is <BLUE>Hossan</BLUE>. I've just moved to
town with my son here, <BLUE>Niko</BLUE>.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? You've seen us before? Of course,
hah hah, I heard about it from Dunhill.
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>You're the one who was coming into town
when we were leaving, aren't you? I'm a
little embarrassed about that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>To tell you the truth, we tried opening
an inn in another town, but it didn't
work out. A total bust...
<PAGE>
<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>So we decided it was better to be here
in this town, and then we got the call
from Dunhill, and here we are.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tourism is vital for developing a town,
after all, so I put out a request in
Town Restoration.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My son and I are so impressed with the
wonderful inn you have built. Thank you
so much.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a feeling we can be successful in
an inn like that. Please come by if you
are in the vicinity.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
